transcript: Envy is wanting something that someone else has that you don't jealousy is fearing that someone is going to take what you have and so like if you are a jealous lover it means that you don't want anyone to talk to the person that you're with but if you're envious of someone else's wife they are jealous you are envious it's I think being precise with that language also helped me understand when a competitor comes into your Market it's actually you're getting jealous because you don't want them to take your customers but if you see some guy on Instagram that you're like man [Â __Â ] that guy it might be because they have something that you don't
